posts.content:
On August 4 and 5, 2012 the split bus only event " Splitbus Nation" will take place in the Domain Puyenbroeck Wachtebeke (Belgium) for the third time. This biennial event is entirely dedicated to the Volkswagen T1 buses. Our main sponsor BBT and all other sponsors make it possible to put down another great event. In the past two editions hundreds of owners of split buses from France, Germany, Netherlands, England and Scotland made a visit to this meeting.

As an organization we offer a varied program with a tour and barbecue on Saturday. On Sunday a meeting with many exhibitors with all VW-related issues such as parts, pinstriping, T-shirts, miniatures and some fun activities. The children are not forgotten with a bouncy castle, face painting and children's bus painting. The domain Puyenbroeck features a spacious site with all necessary facilities (toilets, showers and electricity connection). In addition, the park also offers a range of leisure and sports facilities for young and old as an Olympic swimming pool, mini golf, playgrounds for the kids and you can always visit the restaurant "The 4 Seasons" on the domain.

We look forward to welcoming you and wish you a warm welcome to Splitbus Nation 2012.

Check out http://splitbusnation.be for all information!
Great show and lovely place to stay i must missed it not being on last year
SBN One of the best shows we done in 2010,will defiantly be there in force again this year

Book your campsite,barbecue and breakfast now via our webshop
http://www.splitbusnation.be/SBN/webshop/index.php

Also fill in the registration form here, this is bound to nothing but it gives us an overview whom we all can expect.


If you have any questions, please contact us.

All info: http://splitbusnation.be


See you at SBN2012,

Splitbus Nation Crew

Good news then can get the camping booked now
There are at least seven UK SBS buses already booked the ferry out Dover/Dunkirk on the 2nd august return mon 6th August

Yet over a month and there is Splitbus Nation 2012!

We make you aware that if you want to stay overnight you must book in advance via our webshop. This also applies to the barbecue on Saturday and breakfast on Sunday morning.

All participants with a Splitbus will automatically be entered in the raffle which is a nice prize to win on Sunday!

You may also register via our website: http://splitbusnation.be/SBN/sign_up.ph ... 5&start=30

All info: http://splitbusnation.be

Just two weeks until the event! Have you already booked your campsite and barbecue in our webshop??

Some highlights:
- Saturday August 4, split bus line up before the tour starts.
- After the barbecue on Saturday evening there will be a live band to continue the evening.
- Show and shine at Sunday August 5, all participants will be in the raffle, so everyone has the chance of a very nice price!

Complete program you find at http://splitbusnation.be

Only a few days before Splitbus Nation will start! The crew is ready, are you?
At Saturday August 4, after the spit bus line-up, we have a organized tour to Djoek VW. Faceboook: https://www.facebook.com/events/209737902487350

Camping spots are still available though our webshop: http://splitbusnation.be/SBN/webshop/index.php
Book your breakfast and barbecue while you still can!

At Sunday August 5, we have great trophies, you'd better polish up your splitty! All participants are in the raffle, so all participants can win the price worth over 150 euro!!! All you have to do is be there on the coolest VW split bus only meeting in the Benelux, Splitbus Nation!

If any question let us know though our website: http://splitbusnation.be/SBN/contact.php
Complete program: http://splitbusnation.be/SBN/program.php

See you this weekend at Splitbus Nation, domain "Puyenbroeck', Wachtebeke Belgium.
The first split screen vans have arrived from the UK! Are you next?

Splitbus Nation 2012 is over! SBN 2010 was a great event and therefore difficult to surpass but given the courtesy of the participants we succeeded!

In addition to David Eccles, who was present in 2010 too, we also had Rikki James over throughout the weekend with his '54 RHD barndoor Samba of which there are only 17 known. 'Best of Show' was 'Buzz' Burrell' with an even more rare bus, a RHD barndoor 11 window sunroof also from 1954.

Line-up at Saturday:


Rikki James, Coolest Rat-Look:


'Buzz' Burrell, Best of Show :



Over 500 pictures can be found at our website: http://splitbusnation.be/SBN/gallery/al ... lbum_id=64

Thanks to our sponsors, without them it would not be possible to organize this event.
Also thanks to all participants, some of them drove over 12 hours to get to Splitbus Nation! Superb!

Last but not least a thank you to our crew members, some of them worked over a year almost every day to set up this event.

Enjoy the pictures and we are already looking forward to Splitbus Nation 2014!

We visited the show on Saturday and had a great time!
I just uploaded 280+ pictures on my website www.AirMighty.com be sure to check them out!
Here are some teaser of the line-up and the cruise ...enjoy!
Thanks Neils for the great pics
